chapters.title: Chapter 17: A Bronze Bear
chapters.info: Lady Arathelle Renshar, p. 371—Andoran noble with more power than any other noble in Andor save Dyelin and Luan. Her army met up with Egwene's outside Salidar, and she is now in Murandy. Her House wants Dyelin to take the throne, and is very hesistant to support Elayne.
